resources.string: The file contains proprietary XFA extensions and can\'t be opened.
Portfolio documents cannot be added to this document.
Error while applying appearance (invalid image file path); file not signed.
Error while applying appearance; file not signed.
Failed to save: file is locked for writing
You can use the space below to draw you signature, or just click the \"Pick image…\" button to use an image instead.

By clicking "Sign and Save" the document will be digitally signed using a pre-existent certificate and password, and saved. If you prefer to just add the signature to the field and digitally sign it later, click \"Use Appearance\". Using just the appearance will allow you to further change the thickness and color of the signature.
Choose an image for the signature…
This field is already signed. The following is information about the signature entry:
No changes to the document can be made without invalidating this digital signature.
Form filling and signing digital signatures are allowed without invalidating this digital signature.
Annotating, form filling, and signing digital signatures are allowed without invalidating this digital signature.
Document not restricted by this digital signature.
The document has changes that are allowed by the signatures permissions settings.
The document has changes that are disallowed by the signatures permissions settings.
The document has not been modified since it was certified
The document has not been modified since it was signed
The signer has specified that no changes are allowed for this document
The certifier has specified that no changes are allowed for this document
The signer has specified that Form Fill-in and Signing are allowed for this document. No other changes are permitted.
The certifier has specified that Form Fill-in and Signing are allowed for this document. No other changes are permitted.
The signer has specified that Form Fill-in, Signing and Commenting are allowed for this document. No other changes are permitted.
The certifier has specified that Form Fill-in, Signing and Commenting are allowed for this document. No other changes are permitted.
The signer has specified that there are no restrictions for this document.
The certifier has specified that there are no restrictions for this document.
No detailed trust verification result available.
Verification time used was the current time
Verification time is from the clock on the signer\'s computer
Verification time is from the secure timestamp embedded in the document
Trust verification attempted with respect to current time
Trust verification attempted with respect to signing time: %s
Trust verification attempted with respect to secure embedded timestamp: %s
The digest algorithm that was used to sign the signature: %s .
The digest algorithm that was used to sign the signature is unknown.
The digest is correct, but the digest algorithm is weak and not secure.
The digest algorithm is not supported.
No installed SignatureHandler was able to recognize the signature\'s encoding
The signature has not yet been cryptographically signed.
SignatureHandler reports corruption in the ByteRanges in the digital signature.
SignatureHandler reports corruption in the Contents of the digital signature.
Unsigned signature field with object number %s
Are you sure you want to overwrite the current signature with a new one?
This will delete the current signature. Are you sure you wish to proceed?

Flattening the annotation will make it a permanent part of the PDF, so that it cannot be modified or removed by standard viewing software. This can be undone during this session, however cannot be undone once the document is closed.

string.name: open_universal_succeeded
string.comment: Message shown non-pdf document is finished converting

string.name: cant_edit_while_converting_message
string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted

resources.string: The document can not be edited while it is being converted.

string.name: cant_share_while_converting_message
string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a share action while the document is in the process of being converted

resources.string: The document can not be shared while it is being converted.

string.name: cant_reflow_while_converting_message
string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on the reflow action while the document is in the process of being converted

resources.string: The document can not be viewed in reflow mode while it is being converted.

string.name: cant_print_while_converting_message
string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on a print action while the document is in the process of being converted

resources.string: The document can not be printed while it is being converted.

string.name: cant_search_while_converting_message
string.comment: Pops up when the user clicks on an edit action while the document is in the process of being converted

resources.string: The document can not be searched while it is being converted.
You cannot add annotations to this page! This document appears to be corrupted. Error: %s

The new document has been saved with the filename:
%1$s
Are you sure you want to delete the current page?
When enabled, the scrollbar guideline will be shown together with the scrollbar.
When enabled, the zoom level will not change when you turn pages horizontally.
When enabled, JavaScript actions embedded in PDF files will be executed.
When enabled, a bookmark button will be visible in the viewer to allow bookmarks to be created with a single tap.
When enabled, top toolbar and side navigation drawer will be shown at all time.
When enabled, the number of tabs is unlimited.
When enabled, vertical scrolling will snap to page.
When enabled, system\'s night mode setting will affect the app theme upon restart.
When enabled, visual color will be enhanced, but loading performance will be affected.
When enabled, annotations can be filtered by author, type, color and review status.
Markup is not available in reflow mode.
Search is not available in reflow mode.
Document has been saved and closed.
Save a PDF copy on your device to modify this document.
